mapper.select: SELECT t.token_id, t.token, t.article_id, t.publish_time AS publishTime, -- ✅ 기사 발행일을 여기서 가져옴 (t.frequency / doc_total.total_words) AS tf, LOG(#{totalDocs} / (1 + df_table.df)) AS idf, (t.frequency / doc_total.total_words) * LOG(#{totalDocs} / (1 + df_table.df)) AS tfidf FROM article_tokens t JOIN ( SELECT article_id, SUM(frequency) AS total_words FROM article_tokens GROUP BY article_id ) doc_total ON t.article_id = doc_total.article_id JOIN ( SELECT token, COUNT(DISTINCT article_id) AS df FROM article_tokens GROUP BY token ) df_table ON t.token = df_table.token
SELECT trade_date, daily_volatility FROM stock_prices WHERE trade_date >= #{tradeDate, jdbcType=DATE} ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_keywords (keyword,weight) VALUES (#{keyword},#{weight}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE weight = VALUES(weight)
